title: Aadhi Bhagavan Rap Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Bhagavan Rap Song
Singers: The prophecy, Sathyan
Movie: Aadhi Bhagavan
Music: Yuvan


yo am gonna kill you man
yo know who  I am
gonna kill you, all yo

come test me, am gonna shoot you
cheer .. aam

lets go, yeah
oh g, king of the jungle name just  stop me
you'll be thinking that I am tripping but
master of body anybody
coming looking for me
am legend you little boys taking hands on me
hands up the brands up
round up the mans
my bullets be dancing
my shoulders say dancing

am briefly in killing and defeating
any body step in my zone you must not leaving
and I highly destroy anything in my path

am a psycho and animal came with a rath
set my mind on money and money and my mind
no time for honey coz money on the grand

am hustler baby, an originated gangster, boss
killing everybody but the banker , pause
cant do me nothing, you just wangsta watch
you want to (or yuvan) turn  this beat into a monster
bhagava bhagava bhagava bhagava bhaga …. bhaga..

all around the world they call me bhagavan
you baby get to know the name they call me bhagavan
I take a life in a flash call me bhagavan
bhagavan …. bhagavan,,  (2)

yeah
I'm blood thirsty taking off
my mind keep on taking off
my clock not still loaded
my ak be loaded
so jump n whip we cruising
anybody looking I am loosing
pullout the shortly
count some body
say my goons are getting rowdy , watch out

i dont care who u with
I'll take'em all out
am the boss of this town what you talking about
murder all yo better stop messing around

before the ak splatters body parts on the ground
shades on,
you know am pimping
I stamp your face to the ground till yo limping

am a gangster baby
n yo know g hustler,  boss
killing everybody but the banker , pause
cant do me nothing, you just wangsta watch
you want to (or yuvan) turn  this beat into a monster

all around the world they call me bhagavan
you baby get to know the name they call me bhagavan
I take a life in a flash call me bhagavan
bhagavan …. bhagavan,,  (2)
